tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE genetic_markers (
    marker_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    marker_name VARCHAR(255),
    chromosome VARCHAR(10),
    position INT,
    allele1 VARCHAR(5),
    allele2 VARCHAR(5),
    allele_frequency FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE PopulationData (
    population_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    population_name VARCHAR(50),
    country VARCHAR(50),
    sample_size INT,
    marker_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (marker_id) REFERENCES GeneticMarkers(marker_id)
);

CREATE TABLE marker_data (
  marker_data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  marker_id INT,
  sample_id INT,
  allele_1 VARCHAR(2),
  allele_2 VARCHAR(2),
  allele_frequency FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (marker_id) REFERENCES genetic_markers(marker_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES sample_population(sample_id)
);

CREATE TABLE GeneticMarkers (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  marker_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  chromosome_number INT NOT NULL,
  position INT NOT NULL,
  allele_1 VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  allele_2 VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE MarkerVariants (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  marker_id INT NOT NULL,
  variant_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  allele_frequency FLOAT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (marker_id) REFERENCES GeneticMarkers(id)
);

CREATE TABLE PopulationSamples (
  sample_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  population_id INT NOT NULL,
  sample_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  collection_date DATE NOT NULL,
  sample_size INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (population_id) REFERENCES SamplePopulation(id)
);

CREATE TABLE GeneticMarkers (
    marker_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    marker_name VARCHAR(100),
    chromosome VARCHAR(10),
    position INT,
    allele_1 VARCHAR(1),
    allele_2 VARCHAR(1)
);

CREATE TABLE PopulationSamples (
    sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    population_name VARCHAR(100),
    sample_size INT,
    collection_date DATE,
    marker_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY(marker_id) REFERENCES GeneticMarkers(marker_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ResearchStudies (
    study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    study_title VARCHAR(255),
    researcher_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE StudySamples (
    study_id INT,
    sample_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (study_id, sample_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (study_id) REFERENCES ResearchStudies(study_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES PopulationSamples(sample_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MarkerAssociations (
    association_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    study_id INT,
    marker_id INT,
    p_value FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (study_id) REFERENCES ResearchStudies(study_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (marker_id) REFERENCES GeneticMarkers(marker_id)
);
